name: Lioden - Space
additional_info:
I used Blackthorn Darklily's Simple Blues theme as a template! Full credit goes to them:
https://userstyles.org/styles/126960/lioden-simple-blues

I am still new to CSS so if you find something funky I'm really sorry :(
this will be periodically updated to reflect how i like it, but feel free to change anything you want to change!

Please have the Night theme enabled in order for it to work properly!
